questions.question: What is the area of this rectangle?
questions.svg: <svg width="200" height="120" viewBox="0 0 200 120"><rect x="20" y="20" width="160" height="80" fill="#E0E7FF" stroke="#4F46E5" stroke-width="2"/><text x="100" y="115" text-anchor="middle" font-size="14" fill="#374151">8 cm</text><text x="190" y="65" text-anchor="start" font-size="14" fill="#374151">5 cm</text></svg>
questions.hint: Area of rectangle $= l \times w$. What is $8 \times 5$?

questions.question: What type of angle is this?

questions.hint: What do we call an angle that measures exactly $90°$?

questions.question: What is the perimeter of this square?

questions.hint: Perimeter of square $= 4 \times \text{side}$. All sides are equal!

questions.hint: All sides are equal in an equilateral triangle.

questions.hint: This triangle has no equal sides.

questions.hint: Angles in a triangle sum to $180°$.

What is the sum of angles in a quadrilateral?
questions.hint: A quadrilateral can be split into two triangles.

What is the area of a square with side 6 cm?
What is the missing angle in a triangle if two angles are 40° and 80°?
questions.hint: Angles in a triangle sum to $180°$.

questions.hint: A pentagon has the same number of vertices as sides.

What type of angle is 89°?

How many edges does a rectangular prism have?
